name: Tiro - SFAS 2017
description:
In this game you play as Tiro - Latin for Apprentice or learner. Tiro is an apprentice star spirit. In order to graduate a full Star themselves, they must complete constellations using fragments of stars.

Very simple gameplay controls, only use the mouse to control Tiro. Red stars are anti-astral and will destroy themselves and another star fragment if they collide. White stars flock together, as do the anti-astral stars.

All assets used were either made myself (including music) or provided to me by the SFAS specification.

I really hope you enjoy my game and would love any feedback!
